channel.title: Fuck my life :(
channel.description:
So im going for a fire cape, 43 wave, i'm doing hella good still got considerate amount of brews an restores then....
As im killing the 90 range i accendentially get close to the 360 monster it hits 453 then 200 i die....
FML :|

item.title: Fuck my life :(
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:37, topic:378745”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=474605.msg3474471#msg3474471 date=1295567619]

They wouldn’t actually lose money if they kill 20 or so accounts with their dragon shit would they now?

1 and a half minutes per kill, plus stocking up, the risk of being piled, and if they have low ep… and you cant just kill the same person 20 times, then bye bye like 500k from that, plus like 0 ep every time after like the what, 5th kill? and if they do get any weapon, imo, corrupt dragon is still the biggest rip off… never seen anyone use it, and dont post a youtube vid…

lolwut.
also read my edit

i read it, i didnt see it at first though,

I meant dont post a video because i was talking about my personal sights on rs.

Besides, if your rich on f2p, buy phats, they are gettin rarer by the second, or other rares…
[/quote]
They’re not getting rarer
anyways just buy one and you’re good… santa hats are where it’s at ;)[/quote]
so they arent?
Trust me, they are, EVERY single one lost, makes it a bunch load rarer (noob gets in drop party, noob quits without knowing how good it is) or some other situation.

Read full topic

item.title: Fuck my life :(
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:30, topic:378745”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=474605.msg3474441#msg3474441 date=1295566433]

Since I have started playing again, the last time I had tried it was a few years ago - before all the overpowered weapons and range updates. It was harder then, but still wasn’t all that bad - was all about the timing more than anything, and still is.

I did it the third day of playing again, within the past few weeks - and it is stupidly easy now. It is a shame, it would have been nice for them to scale up the difficulty with the equipment now available.

This.

Right now, F2P is the closest you can get to 07 - 04 RS… P2P is a completely new thing, a completely uber and stupid thing overrun by 9 year olds.

omgrufurreal.

yebroim4r34l

tell me three super powered weapon that has been added into F2P since 07
[/quote]
Corrupted dragon?
I really didn’t like that addition to pvp, although…
if the minigamez live so do I[/quote]

dragon isnt overpowered at all. besides, even if it IS the strongest metal armour in F2P, it runs out in like 30 mins, doesnt it?

go spend like 14m for 5 hrs of d long, not even combat time, just however long your logged in… if someone was to buy those and usem pking regularly, they would loose money… (any dragon pieces imo.)

Read full topic
